price: 51.Nabiyow koros wariggitta waqdi ablinnitoy gibdim abaluk ten, tokkel nek ma-yassaqqaanaay, xayi ikkeek yabbixsimeeniih, girâ fan ken beyan.
arabic: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ فَزِعُواْ فَلَا فَوۡتَ وَأُخِذُواْ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaw tarā idh faziʿū falā fawta wa-ukhidhū min makānin qarībin
